channel.title: Portuguese Project [Projecto Português(PT)]
channel.description:
[u][b]English[/b][/u]: Ok, me and a friend of mine have decided to start the 1st fully Portuguese Runescape server, fully translated to Portuguese. I am currently searching for [b][u]Portuguese[/u][/b] players. There are still GM (Admin/Mod) Positions to be filled up, so if you are Portuguese, or if you know Portuguese please reply to this topic. There are some Developers Positions that need filling up too. I will be the hoster of this Project, the one little problems that we are still sorting out a good name.
[u][b] Portuguese[/b][/u]: Ok, eu e uns amigos meus decidimos começar o primeiro Projecto Nacional, deste tipo. Um servidor privado de runescape totalmente em português. Estamos a procura de jogadores portugueses para iniciar este projecto. Existem vários cargos de GM para serem ocupados.(Admin/Mod) Ou seja, se és português, ou falas portugês, responde a este tópico.
[center][u][b]Head Coder[/b][/u]: Raze (Me)
[u][b]Hoster[/b][/u]: Raze (Me)
[u][b]GameMaster1[/b][/u]: Drakine
[u][b]GameMaster2[/b][/u]: Open
[u][b]GameMaster3[/b][/u]: Open
[u][b]GameMaster4[/b][/u]: Open[/center]

item.title: Portuguese Project [Projecto Português(PT)]
item.dc:creator: @Devianz Devianz
item.description:
@Devianz wrote:

English:
Ok, me and a friend of mine have decided to start the 1st fully Portuguese Runescape server, fully translated to Portuguese.
I am currently searching for Portuguese players.
There are still GM (Admin/Mod) Positions to be filled up, so if you are Portuguese, or if you know Portuguese please reply to this topic.
There are some Developers Positions that need filling up too.
I will be the hoster of this Project, the one little problems that we are still sorting out a good name.


Portuguese:
Ok, eu e uns amigos meus decidimos começar o primeiro Projecto Nacional, deste tipo. Um servidor privado de runescape totalmente em português.
Estamos a procura de jogadores portugueses para iniciar este projecto.
Existem vários cargos de GM para serem ocupados.(Admin/Mod)
Ou seja, se és português, ou falas portugês, responde a este tópico.

[center]Head Coder:
Raze (Me)

Hoster:
Raze (Me)

GameMaster1:
Drakine

GameMaster2:
Open

GameMaster3:
Open

GameMaster4:
Open[/center]

Read full topic
